page.title: 14CHILDREN'S GAMES IN BIBURY
page.content: The most popular game children play is Tag. Tag needs four players or more. Someone is 'on it'. You need a den where others will be safe. The person who is 'on it' has to count to ten and try to catch the others. If caught you become 'on it' and take your turn to catch the others. In chain tag, those caught join hands to make a chain to catch the others. In 'of_ground tag' you do not have a 'den' but are safe if your feet are off_ground on a wall or climbing frame. 'Stuck in the mud' is like tag but, if caught, you stand with your arms and legs stretched out. Other people can free you by going under your legs or arms. If you get caught three times you become 'on it'.
